description: This circular walk follows a series of footpaths through the countryside around Farnborough in Bromley. The walk passes the Grade I listed Holwood House and the lovely Keston Common with its peaceful ponds and variety of wildlife. There is also a pleasant woodland section through Ninehams Woods just before returning to Farnborough. You can extend your walk by joining with the Three Commons Walk which takes you on a tour of Hayes, Keston and West Wickham common.
